alert.message: StorJ Node has rebooted more than once in 24 hours!
alert.name: Reboot Alert

alert.message:
StorJ node has critical audit message.  Please verify mount points, fstab, etc.
docker logs storagenode 2>&1 | grep GET_AUDIT | grep failed | grep open
alert.name: Audit Critical alert

alert.message:
InfoDB Critical Warning.  Check InfoDB Health.

docker logs storagenode 2>&1 | grep "disk image is malformed"
https://storjlabs.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/SCKB/pages/104235043/How+to+fix+a+database+disk+image+is+malformed
alert.name: InfoDB check alert

alert.message: IOWait is high, check disk performance.
alert.name: IO Wait alert

alert.message: Disk Usage is high +75%, Consider expanding storage, or start a new node once this volume is full.
alert.name: Used Disk alert
